translation: So...that left arm of yours is fake, right, Zero?{#Name="Dito"}
source: So...that left arm of yours is fake, right, Zero?{#Name="Dito"}

translation: So how do you move it around, then?{#Name="Dito"}
source: So how do you move it around, then?{#Name="Dito"}

translation: There's a parasite that attaches it to my body.{#Name="Zero"}
source: There's a parasite that attaches it to my body.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: What? Not a machine or anything? Freaky.{LF}...Can I see it?{#Name="Dito"}
source: What? Not a machine or anything? Freaky.{LF}...Can I see it?{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Me too! I wanna see, I wanna see!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Me too! I wanna see, I wanna see!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: You know, this sister of yours is more trouble than she's worth.{#Name="Dito"}
source: You know, this sister of yours is more trouble than she's worth.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Zero, that trick you did earlier was really neat!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Zero, that trick you did earlier was really neat!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: But...why don't you make a new arm instead of using{LF}that fake one?{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: But...why don't you make a new arm instead of using{LF}that fake one?{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Man, grown-ups sure have it tough...{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Man, grown-ups sure have it tough...{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: You got a fake arm, you can regrow your body...{LF}You're amazing, Zero!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: You got a fake arm, you can regrow your body...{LF}You're amazing, Zero!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: All we wound up finding in that region was a lousy mutt.{#Name="Zero"}
source: All we wound up finding in that region was a lousy mutt.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: I was flying around earlier, trying to be helpful and stuff...{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: I was flying around earlier, trying to be helpful and stuff...{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: And I think I saw a shrine over in that direction!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: And I think I saw a shrine over in that direction!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Hey, yeah. I've heard something about that.{#Name="Dito"}
source: Hey, yeah. I've heard something about that.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: They say the shrine in the Land of Mountains{LF}is spread out like a plaza.{#Name="Dito"}
source: They say the shrine in the Land of Mountains{LF}is spread out like a plaza.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Sooo, what? North, then?{LF}...All right, let's go.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Sooo, what? North, then?{LF}...All right, let's go.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: The enemy's counterattack grew increasingly desperate.{#Name="アコール"}
source: The enemy's counterattack grew increasingly desperate.{#Name="アコール"}

translation: And the shrine where Four was said to be hiding out{#Name="アコール"}
source: And the shrine where Four was said to be hiding out{#Name="アコール"}

translation: was itself hidden within a massive defensive facility...{#Name="アコール"}
source: was itself hidden within a massive defensive facility...{#Name="アコール"}
